lines.text: My Pokémon deserve the best. If one of them gets a scratch, I give it a Full Restore.
I do not care for anything less.
My Pokémon have to be the most powerful, with all the money I've spent on their Poké Balls.
Invest money, get a return on investment. Prove me wrong.
Suppose I do not bother with Pokémon hunting, and buy a full Pokédex from a poorer kid.
Would I, then, be an accomplished Trainer with no effort?
Father sent me out in the world to become a seasoned Trainer.
I have lost all my battles so far but I am still richer than you. Hm!
